title: Koogel Small Pocket Notebook, 50 Sheets/20 Pads Spiral Memo Pads Ruled 7.6 x 12.7cm (3"x5") Lined Pocket Notepads with Durable Covers for Office School Memo Tactical Steno Pads
features: SUPER VALUE PACK - 20PCS memo notepads, each page is about 12.5cm x 7.5cm (3x5 inches), in 8 different colours. 50 sheets per pad, 2000 pages in total. Hard covers attached, this ensures that you can take notes on the move or in situations where you can't rest on a desk.

TOP SPIRAL BINDING - Our lined memo book features a top spiral binding that allows the pages to lay flat. This ensures the most comfortable writing conditions for both right-handed and left-handed users. The snag-free spiral binding won't catch on clothing or in purses or backpacks, providing a hassle-free experience. This mini memo book also allows for easy page-turning, enhancing your productivity.

PREMIUM QUALITY - Pocket notebooks are made of all-wood pulp paper that offers a smooth-writing surface. The pages are designed to prevent ink from bleeding through, allowing you to write on both sides without any concerns. With lines on each sheet, you can keep your writing neat and organised.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL USE - Our small notepad is not limited to just note-taking, this pad can be used to create DIY greeting cards, serve as a memo pad, scratch pad for outdoor activity recording, also perfect for outdoor use, providing a reliable platform for capturing your thoughts and ideas.

VERSATILE & EASY TO USE - This pocket notepad serves as an all-purpose journal, diary, and scheduler, catering to modern, on-the-go lifestyles, a perfect companion for travelers, students, business colleagues, teachers, and parents.
